fullText:
Longtooth Doom

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Longtooth shifter, longtooth shifting racial power, invoker, Covenant of Malediction class feature
Benefit: When you use longtooth shifting, you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls with invoker attack powers until the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 387, page(s) 41.
